revised_title: Experimental Verification of Armature Reaction in Dynamo-Electric Machinery
tldr: The authors conducted experiments on two identical dynamos to study the effect of armature reaction on the magnetic field and performance of dynamo-electric machines. They found that the current in the armature influences the magnetic field and verified the relationship between the armature reaction and the machine's performance. This research is essential for improving the efficiency and design of dynamo-electric machines.
